С детства играю.. и буду играть дальше)
Все знают эту игру. Самая обычная, без шедевральной графики. Но почему же она так затягивает? Скорее всего своей простотой. Главная цель: уничтожить противника. Нет всяких затянутых сюжетов и т.д. Многие жалуются на графику. Но мне она совершенно не мешает. Могу играть целый день))

Wanted to write my review for the original Counter Strike again after playing it for a while. And i must say... I'm really surprised. There is not much to say about the game its Counter Strike, its the classic one, the first one, everyone knows it, everyone loves it. The game itself is good even with its outdated graphics. But you can't complain about the graphics its a classic after all the old graphics simply just make it better. What really surprised me is the community and the gunplay. The community is, at least to a certain degree, still alive. There is populated servers out there. Death runs, zombie modes, aim maps, surfing and more. Majority of the stuff i've seen have either been Turkish servers or Russian servers but i did manage to find English speaking people in those Russian servers so not all hope is lost. And  the gunplay... It is... surprisingly good? I'm so used to CSGO's gunplay because its the most recent CS game i played and i started getting really used to it. That game feels a lot more slow and careful then this one. I would see someone, stop, crouch, aim and shoot and thats it. Running and gunning was generally a bad idea. But in here? I've killed so many people, blown off so many heads while simply strafing full speed to the left and to the right shooting my gun in short bursts all this time. It works. It works really well. Maybe even too well. Some players in here are scary good at this. Oh and the best part? In CSGO there are things you can shoot through but its not that many. In here you could be sitting behind 2 wood boxes in a map and still get shot through it. You can't run away once a bullet hits you. It will stop you dead in your tracks and make you an easier target. You fight or you die my friend!

+Its a classic! The classic guns, the classic sounds, the classic gameplay, the classic characters, graphics and maps.
+People still play this game. Knife fights, zombie modes, surfing, death runs... Yeah its all here. I haven't found any normal servers but i'm sure i could if i just looked for it.
+The gunplay is surprisingly good. Its a lot more faced paced and a lot more scary then the other CS games.
+Good sounds, classic graphics, good gameplay and its even easy to run! Sure ping can get a bit troublesome at times but hey thats the price you pay to play an online game i guess!

-No AI support unfortunately. You can't just play a Dust 2 map with only AI.

Steam sells this along with its... Expansion pack i believe? "Condition Zero" which actually has an AI mode even if its a bit meh. Either way its sold in a package. If i'm not mistaken these games should be available in the Valve Complete Pack as well so you're better off buying that pack and getting all the good and classic games.
